entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023
